author: ianh
msg: r->headers_in is shared by original requests and components (make no sense
copy them for components), but each component has its own r->pool.
So once the first component set "Max-Forwards", it is in headers_in
but the value could get lost with the first component's r->pool.
Hence I sometimes see "Max-Forwards" has value like letter "l".
Change it to use apr_table_set() fixed the problem.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: (reformat the script to make a little easier when adding archives.)

author: jerenkrantz
msg: When we do the moving of the archive, we need to toss the old DBM since
we don't automatically remove the old messages.
